data.event: Jordan was platted in 1854, and named after the Jordan River in West Asia.
Won the State Tournament four straight years from 2005 to 2008, took 2nd place in 2010 and took 3rd place in years 2004 and 2009.
Won the State Tournament four straight years from 2005 to 2008, took 2nd place in 2010 and took 3rd place in years 2004 and 2009.
Won the National/Regional Tournament three straight years from 2005 to 2007 and took runner-up in 2008.
